overview.en: RIFT Token (RIFT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. RIFT Token has a current supply of 11,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of RIFT Token is 20.74060585 USD and is down -5.16 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $558.59 traded over the last 24 hours.
